## Lastly to look at them all together and compair



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Actual-Hocky-Project_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## My Final Ballot for the Vezina Award is ...

### 1.Connor Hellebuyck 
### 2. Andrei Vasilevskiy
### 3. Makenzie Blackwood 
### 4. Logan Thompson
### 5. Filip Gustavsson

###### I did choose Gustavsson over Wolf. Gustavsson beats wolf in SV% and GSAA. While Wolf has higher HDGSAA, I think SV and GSAA are more important and Wolf was ranked 7th in both of those.

# Frank J. Selke Trophy 



## Total Penalties 
#### In my mind the best defensive player should be the most agresive and therefore have the most penalties




::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Actual-Hocky-Project_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Top 5: for penalties 
#### 1. Brady Tkachuk 
#### 2. Mathiew Oliver
#### 3. A.J. Green
#### 4. Brad Machand
#### 5. Sam Bennett


## Penalties Drawn
#### The best defensive player should also make people the most mad and there get the most penalties commited against them.



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Actual-Hocky-Project_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



### Top 5 Penalties Drawn 
#### 1. Brady Tkachuk
#### 2. Tom Wilson
#### 3. Garret Hathaway
#### 4. Nico Hischier
#### 5. Nazem Kadri



## Takeaways
#### To sort the top 5 for total penalties adn top 5 for penalties drawn I used Takeaway stat



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
         Player Takeaways
1   Nazem Kadri        22
2   Sam Bennett        22
3 Nico Hischier        19
4    Tom Wilson        16
5 Brady Tkachuk        15
```


:::
:::


### My Ballet is
#### 1. Nazem Kadri 
#### 2. Sam Bennett
#### 3. Nico Hischier
#### 4. Tom Wilson 
#### 5. Brady Tkachuk
